column2: "Afei ɔhen Solomon dɔɔ mbaa ananaben piinara kaa Farao ne babaa no ho
column3: mbaa a wofi Moabfo
column4: Ammonfo

column2: "wofi amanaman a EWURADZE kaa ho asɛm kyerɛɛ Israelmba dɛ
column3: Mma hom nnkɔ hɔn mu
column4: nkyii so mma hɔn so mmba hom mu: na ampa wɔbɛdan hom akoma ekedzi hɔn enyame ekyir no a: woyinom na Solomon takyeer hɔn ho wɔ ɔdɔ mu."

column2: "Na onyaa yernom ahaesuon
column3: ahembaa a
column4: na nponafo ahaasa: na ne yernom daan n’akoma."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Solomon yɛɛ akɔdaa no
column4: ne yernom daan n’akoma kedzii enyame fofor ekyir: na n’akoma enndzi mu wɔ EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn ho
column5: dɛ mbrɛ n’egya David n’akoma tse."

column2: "Na Solomon kedzii Zidonfo bosom Astoret ekyir
column3: na Ammonfo ekyiwadze Milkɔm ekyir."

column2: "Na Solomon yɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: na oenndzi EWURADZE ekyir ennwie
column4: dɛ mbrɛ n’egya David yɛe."

column2: "Nna Solomon sii bea sorɔnsorɔm maa Moab ekyiwadze Kemos
column3: wɔ bepɔw a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm enyim no do
column4: na Ammonmba ekyiwadze Molek."

column2: "Na dɛm na ɔyɛe maa ne yernom ananaben nyinara a wɔhyeew eduhuam na wɔbɔɔ afɔr maa hɔn abosom no."
"Na EWURADZE no bo fuuw Solomon
column3: osiandɛ n’akoma adan efi ɔno EWURADZE
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn no a oeyi noho akyerɛ no mpɛn ebien no ho."

column2: "Ɔno a ɔahyɛ no asɛm yi ho mbra dɛ mma ɔnnkɔ nnkedzi enyame fofor ekyir no: naaso oenndzi dza EWURADZE hyɛe no do."
"Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE see Solomon dɛ
column3: Susuampa dɛ ɔwo ayɛ iyi
column4: na enndzi m’ahyɛmu na m’ahyɛdze a mehyɛɛ wo no do ntsi
column5: ampa mebɛtsew ahendzi no efi wo nsamu

column2: "Naaso wo nda mu dze merennyɛ
column3: osian w’egya David ntsi: na mbom mebɛtsew efi wo ba nsamu."

column2: "Naaso merenntsew ahendzi no nyinara; na medze ebusuakuw kor bɛma wo ba
column3: osian m’akowaa David
column4: na Jerusalɛm a masan mu meyi no ntsi."

column2: "Na EWURADZE maa ɔtamfo bi soɛree tsiaa Solomon
column3: Edomnyi Hadad a ofi ɔhen n’asefo mu wɔ Edom no a."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a David bɔɔ Edom
column4: na dɔm safohen Joab fowee kɔr dɛ orikesie atɔfo no

column2: "(na Joab na Israel nyinara tsenaa hɔ abosoom esia
column3: kodur dɛ okuuw ɔbanyin biara ase wɔ Edom;)"

column2: "naaso Hadad guanee
column3: ɔno na Edomfo bi a wofi n’egya nkowaa mu ka no ho
column4: dɛ wɔrokɔ Egypt; nna Hadad yɛ abofra kakrabaa."

column2: "Na wɔsoɛree fii Midian
column3: na wɔbaa Paran: na wɔfaa mbarimba bi wɔ Paran kaa hɔnho
column4: na wɔbaa Egypt
column5: wɔ Egypthen Farao nkyɛn; ɔno na ɔmaa no fie

column2: "Na Hadad nyaa enyimnyam kɛse wɔ Farao enyim
column3: ma ɔdze nankasa ne yer no nua
column4: ɔhembaa Tafenes no nua

column2: "Na Tafenes no nua no woo ne babanyin Genubat maa no
column3: na Tafenes tsetsee no wɔ Farao fie: na Genubat nye Farao ne mba no bɔɔ mu nyinii."

column2: "Na aber a Hadad tsee no wɔ Egypt dɛ David nye n’egyanom akɛda
column3: na dɔm safohen Joab so ewu no
column4: Hadad see Farao dɛ; Gya me kwan ma monkɔ mankasa me man mu."

column2: "Nna Farao see no dɛ
column3: Na ebɛnadze na ehia no wɔ me nkyɛn
column4: ma erohwehwɛ dɛ ekɔ wankasa wo man mu yi? Na obuaa dɛ
column5: Nnyɛ biribiara a: naaso ɔkwan ara na gya me ma monkɔ."

column2: "Afei so Nyankopɔn maa ɔtamfo kor so soɛree tsiaa no
column3: Eliada ba Rezon a oguanee fii no wura Zobahen Hadadezer nkyɛn no a:"

column2: "na ɔboaboaa mbarimba ano maa noho
column3: na ɔbɛyɛɛ dɔm do safohen
column4: wɔ aber a David kum hɔn a wofi Zoba no: na wosii mu kɔr Damaskɔs

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ ɔtamfo maa Israel wɔ Solomon ne nda nyinara mu
column3: na ɔno so tseetsee hɔn dɛ mbrɛ Hadad yɛe no: na okyiir Israel
column4: na odzii Siria do hen."

column2: "Na Nebat ne ba Jeroboam
column3: Efraimnyi bi a ofi Zereda
column4: a ɔyɛ Solomon n’akowaa na ne na ne dzin dze Zerua
column6: so maa ne nsa do tsiaa ɔhen no."

column2: "Na asɛm a osian ntsi ma ɔmaa ne nsa do tsiaa ɔhen no nye yi: Solomon sii Millo
column3: na osisiiw n’egya David kurow ho etokur."

column2: "Na dɛm Jeroboam no ɔyɛ ɔbarimba katakyi a ɔyɛ ndam: na Solomon hun aberantsɛ no dɛ ɔyɛ mbɔdzembɔnyi no
column3: ɔmaa ɔhwɛɛ Josef fie edwuma nyinara do."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ mber no mu
column3: aber a Jeroboam fi Jerusalɛm rokɔ no
column4: nkɔnhyɛnyi Silonnyi Ahija hun no wɔ ɔkwan no mu; nna Ahija hyɛ atar fofor; na hɔn beenu nko na wɔwɔ haban no mu."

column2: "Na Ahija tae suoo atar fofor a ɔhyɛ no no mu
column3: na ɔtsetseew mu esinesin duebien."

column2: "Na ɔsee Jeroboam dɛ
column3: Yi esinesin du woara fa; na mbrɛ EWURADZE
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi
column6: mebɛtsew ahendzi no efi Solomon ne nsamu
column7: na medze mbusuakuw du ama wo:"

column2: "(na ɔnodze
column3: obenya ebusuakuw kor
column4: wɔ m’akowaa David ntsi
column6: kurow a masan mu meyi no wɔ Israel mbusuakuw nyinara mu no ntsi:)"

column2: "osiandɛ wɔapow me
column3: na wɔakɔsom Zidonfo hɔn bosom Astoret
column4: Moab nyame Kemos
column5: na Ammonmba nyame Milcom; na wɔannantsew m’akwan mu dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ m’enyiwa do
column6: na woedzi m’ahyɛdze na m’atsɛmbu do

column2: "Naaso merenngye ahendzi no nyinara wɔ ne nsamu: na mebɛyɛ no ɔhen wɔ no nkwa nda nyinara mu wɔ m’akowaa David ntsi
column3: ɔno a mesaan mu miyii no
column4: osiandɛ odzii me mbransɛm na m’ahyɛdze do:"

column2: "na mbom mebɛgye ahendzi no mefi ne ba nsamu
column3: na medze ama wo
column4: mekyerɛ mbusuakuw du no a."

column2: "Na medze ebusuakuw kor mebɛma ne ba no
column3: ama m’akowaa David oeenya kandzea daa wɔ m’enyim
column4: wɔ Jerusalɛm
column5: kurow a masan mu meyi no dɛ medze me dzin mobɔto hɔ no mu."

column2: "Na mebɛfa ɔwo
column3: na ibedzi hen dɛ mbrɛ wo kra pɛ nyinara na edzi Israel do hen."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ sɛ itsie dza mebɛhyɛ wo nyinara
column3: na enantsew m’akwan do
column4: na eyɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ m’enyiwa do
column5: dɛ ibedzi m’ahyɛdze na me mbra do
column6: dɛ mbrɛ m’akowaa David yɛe no a; ɔno mibedzi w’ekyir
column7: na m’akyekyer ofi a otsim ama wo
column8: dɛ mbrɛ mekyekyeree memaa David no

column2: "Na iyi ntsi mibehiahia David n’asefo ho
column3: na nnyɛ daa nyina."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Solomon hwehwɛɛ dɛ oku Jeroboam: na Jeroboam soɛree
column3: na oguanee kɔr Egypt
column4: wɔ Egypthen Sisak nkyɛn
column5: na ɔtsenaa Egypt araa ma okodur Solomon no wu mu."

column2: "Afei Solomon ho nsɛm nkaa
column3: na dza ɔyɛe nyinara
column4: na ne nyansaa no
column5: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Solomon ho nsɛm nwoma no mu bi a?"

column2: "Na mber a Solomon dze dzii hen wɔ Israel nyinara do wɔ Jerusalɛm no ɔyɛ mfe eduanan."
"Na Solomon kɔr ne nsamankyir
column3: na wosiee no wɔ n’egya David kurow mu: na ne ba Rehoboam dzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."
